title: Jim Rooney to welcome HGA Global Forum to Boston
text:
Jim Rooney to welcome HGA Global Forum to Boston Jim Rooney to welcome HGA Global Forum to Boston Details Category: Venues & Events Created on Friday, 24 July 2015 10:00 Hosts Global Alliance (HGA) and NXTevent, A Hosts Global Alliance Member, are working diligently to add the final touches to the 3rd Annual HGA Global Forum in Boston, Massachusetts. Hosted at the Royal Sonesta Boston from July 31st – August 3rd, the HGA Global Forum brings top meeting planners and DMC members together for leading industry educational sessions and professional networking that is second to none. 
Denise Marie Germano, Associate Director of Global Events & Communications for HGA, comments, “The dedicated team at NXTevent and our remarkable HGA staff have come together to plan a truly memorable event. We have so many unique experiences lined up, from top notch speakers to extraordinary entertainment; this event is one that should not be missed!” The agenda this year has been filled with a number of quintessential local Boston tours and activities, engaging event receptions, and an abundance of educational speakers, including a welcome from Boston’s very own Jim Rooney, recently promoted President and CEO of the Greater Boston Chamber of Commerce. While in educational sessions, attendees will have the opportunity to gain professional development and earn continuing education credits for the Certified Meeting Professional credential. In addition to the educational career advancement, attendees will also have the opportunity to meet one on one with HGA Members from over 190 destinations worldwide to discuss trends and event needs. Marty MacKay, President of HGA, comments, “It’s no secret that the HGA Global Forum has become a widely sought out and attended annual DMC event in the industry. Our commitment to delivering quality industry education, valuable networking opportunities, and unforgettable destination experiences is something that we continue to deliver on every year at this event. On top of that, we always look forward to displaying our H Factor for attendees to experience. When you love what you do, it really shows. We can’t wait to share that with our clients.” Hosts Global Alliance (HGA), is a worldwide consortium of select Destination Management Companies. We believe that every destination holds the promise of an inspiring experience. Hosts Global Alliance delivers on that promise with unparalleled service, fresh thinking, and a global network of local experts. HGA currently represents over 50 Destination Management Companies, servicing over 190 locations. Hosts Global Alliance provides a full service approach for customers planning group programs in the meetings, convention, and incentive industry for corporations, associations, meeting management, and incentive travel companies. There is always a Hosts solution. Every time. Everywhere. Related articles
